typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadVendors
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadInvoices
ReadVendors, ReadInvoices exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VendorsWithoutInvoices
